content: mini easter egg bunny designed by audrey lilian the first little bunny likes to wear a hat the second little bunny doesn t forget to wear her bow the third little bunny puts a flower on her head the fourth little bunny decorates his shirt with a bow tie the pattern and all pictures here are the property of audrey lilian audrey__lc this pattern is for personal use distribution of this pattern in whole or part is not allowed you may sell the finished product made from this pattern but please credit me as the designer you can contact me at alice_alc@yahoo com or send a direct message to my instagram account @audrey__lc ravelry https //www ravelry com/stores/audrey-lilian-designs etsy https //www etsy com/shop/audreyliliancrochet amigurumi com https //www amigurumi com/shop/audrey-lilian-crochet ©2024 audrey lilian notes this pattern is crocheted in continuous rounds unless otherwise stated using us crochet terms i use x stitch crochet yarn under then yarn over in this pattern the size of the finished toy may vary according to the yarn thickness hook size and your gauge mini easter egg bunny that i made is about 8 cm tall tools and materials  2 5 mm hook  5 mm safety eyes  cotton yarn in sport weight  white beige or any color you like for the head ears arms legs tail  any 2 colors you like for the body  any color you like for nose embroidery and legs  any color you like for the accessories bow hat or flowers  dark brown for smile embroidery  pink for cheek blush embroidery  fiberfill  scissors  tapestry needle  safety pins  stitch markers or scraps of yarn for markers  tweezers optional to hide yarn ends in small parts abbreviations example of how to read the pattern round 5 7 single_crochet 3 increase single_crochet 2 decrease 16 round round magic_ring magic_ring in round 5 we make single_crochet in the next 7 blo back loop only stitches increase in the next 3 stitches single_crochet in flo front loop only the next stitch decrease 2 times we will chain chain have 16 stitches in total slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet increase increase 2 single_crochet in 1 stitch decrease decrease invisible decrease insert the hook into the front loops of the next two stitches you will have 3 loops on the hook grab the yarn pull it through the first 2 loops on the hook you will have 2 loops on the hook yarn over pull it through both loops on the hook *for decrease in blo i do the usual decrease insert the hook into the back loop grab the yarn pull it through the back loop you will have 2 loops on the hook insert the hook into the next back loop grab the yarn pull it through the back loop you will have 3 loops on the hook yarn over pull it through all 3 loops on
